2094980.name: QUADRA CLASH - Combat Test Demo
2094980.description:
Step into QUADRA CLASH, the fast-paced third-person arena shooter built in Unreal Engine 5, where every shot counts and strategy rules the battlefield! In thrilling matches, four dynamic teams—Green, Red, Yellow, and Blue—battle fiercely in rounds of intense, colourful combat. Each team of five players fights with ballistic-style weapons, firing vibrant, tracer-like projectiles resembling heavy-duty paintballs, creating dazzling chaos across the arena. It's a ruthless, one-shot elimination—accuracy, agility, and teamwork determine victory!

Compete across various exhilarating game modes: dominate your rivals in Team Deathmatch, secure and protect vital points in Capture the Flag, control key locations in King of the Hill, or prove your individual prowess in Team MVP mode. Whether you prefer casual fun or competitive glory, QUADRA CLASH has you covered with its accessible Normal Mode and fiercely competitive Ranked Mode.

Coordinate, strategize, and colourfully annihilate your enemies in the ultimate arena clash—only one team will reign supreme. Will it be yours?
